SmControl

Class Prism

  • java.lang.Object
    • SmControl.Prism

  • public class Prism
extends java.lang.Object
    Main class for the PRISM strong motion analysis tool. This is the controller for the batch processing mode, to be started from the command line or automatically by other software. This class takes an input folder as a param., reads in *.V0 files in the folder and then processes each file in turn. Processing involves reading in the file and parsing into record(s), running the waveform processing algorithms to create the data products, and then writing out the data in the different formats.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws SmException,
                        java.io.IOException,
                        java.lang.Exception
        Main method starts the loggers, reads in the configuration file, reads in all .v0 or .v0c file names in the input folder, processes each file in turn, and then deletes the input file.
        Parameters:
        args - input string arguments, input folder, output folder, optional configuration file (full path names)
        Throws:
        SmException - if a fatal error occurs during processing
        java.io.IOException - if unable to read in the files or file names
        java.lang.Exception

        Throws:

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if unable to read the configuration file
        java.lang.NoSuchFieldException - if unable to find a specific parameter name
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if unable to access a class value
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if unable to access a specific parameter
